mapper.select: /* SysCodeGroup.select */ SELECT A.PRE_CD ,B.CODE_NM ,A.REF1_CONFIG ,A.REF2_CONFIG ,A.REF3_CONFIG ,A.REF4_CONFIG ,A.REF5_CONFIG ,A.USE_YN ,A.COM_YN ,A.MEMO ,A.CREATER ,A.CREATE_DT ,A.CHANGER ,A.CHANGE_DT ,A.CHANGE_IP FROM SYS_CODE_GROUP A LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT PRE_CD,CODE_NM FROM SYS_CODE_LOCALE WHERE CODE ='0000000000' AND LOCALE_CD IN( SELECT REF1 FROM SYS_CODE WHERE PRE_CD='COM_000003' AND CODE ='DEFAULT' ) )B ON(B.PRE_CD = A.PRE_CD)
